name: NEFilterRule
desc: A rule for filters that combines a rule to match network traffic and an action to take when the rule matches.

items.name: init(networkRule: NENetworkRule, action: NEFilterAction)
items.desc: Creates a new filter rule from a network rule and an action to take when network traffic matches.

items.name: var networkRule: NENetworkRule
items.desc: The network rule that defines the network traffic characteristics that this filter rule matches.

items.name: var action: NEFilterAction
items.desc: The action to take when this rule matches network traffic.
